request.description: Sube una plantilla de reporte (archivo .docx)

body.raw:
{
    "details": [
        {
            "locale": "en",
            "title": "SQL Injection",
            "vulnType": "Web Application",
            "description": "SQL injection vulnerability allows attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands.",
            "observation": "The application does not properly sanitize user input.",
            "remediation": "Use parameterized queries or prepared statements.",
            "references": ["https://owasp.org/www-community/attacks/SQL_Injection"]
        }
    ],
    "cvssv3": "CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H",
    "priority": 1,
    "remediationComplexity": 2,
    "category": "Injection"
}

request.description: Combina dos vulnerabilidades en una

body.raw:
{
    "title": "SQL Injection in Login Form",
    "vulnType": "Web Application",
    "description": "A SQL injection vulnerability was found in the login form.",
    "observation": "The username parameter is vulnerable to SQL injection.",
    "remediation": "Use parameterized queries.",
    "cvssv3": "CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H",
    "priority": 1,
    "references": ["https://owasp.org/www-community/attacks/SQL_Injection"],
    "poc": "username: admin' OR '1'='1",
    "scope": "https://app.acme.com/login",
    "status": 0
}

body.raw:
{
  "titulo": "Evaluaci\u00f3n de Seguridad Web",
  "descripcion": "Procedimiento para evaluar seguridad en aplicaciones web",
  "auditId": "{{auditId}}",
  "tipo": "tecnica",
  "alcance": "aplicacion_web"
}
